group_1.narration: It's a miracle we made it this far...
We froze Eve in its tracks, even managed to@get Touka and Nemu their memories back.@We saved Ui... We defeated Alina...@We even took out Eve...
But all that was more than enough to@deplete our stamina, magic and willpower.@And it cost us a dear friend, too.
The only thing we have left to lose@at this point are our lives...
Walpurgisnacht will pass @through the center of the city.
Did I succeed, or did I fail?
It's painful...I'm so full of regret...@I wanted to do something to prevent this.
But right now, Madoka is right by my side,@still alive.
So...as long as that's the case,@maybe I won't have to turn back time...

group_1.textRight: Nnn...gh...

group_1.textLeft: Madoka!

group_1.textRight: We have to kill her... We have to destroy@Walpurgisnacht...

group_1.textLeft: You can't! Even if you tried, you'd...!

group_1.textRight: I know, Homura... I know.
This isn't the kind of foe I can defeat@just by pushing myself past the limit.
But I'm a Magical Girl. I got here by@wishing for hope.
I can't lose to something that spreads@curses.
We can't accept that in the end we just@cause suffering.
So I'm going to fight.
So no one will get hurt because of what@we wished for...
We have to prove that the hope we wished for@and the miracles we brought about are real.

group_1.textLeft: Why? Why are you always like this?

group_1.narration: I need to stand and fight too. If I give@up, we really will lose everything.
Mitakihara, where Madoka and the others@live, could very well be lost too.
I can't let the sacrifices we've@already made be in vain!
I can't just wait around for a miracle!
But I can't move... Please!@Please, just let me fight!
Let me fight one last time! Please!

group_1.textCenter: I feel like I can hear something...
Are you here to help me?
My body feels so much lighter...

group_1.textLeft: I feel it too...

group_1.textRight: Me too! I feel as light as if I'd sprouted a@pair of wings!

group_1.textLeft: That's not all... I feel like there's@something behind me, urging me on.

group_1.textRight: Yes... You're right!
Just a moment ago I felt so cornered...
This feels like...magic!

group_1.textLeft: Duh! We're MAGICAL Girls, right?
Maybe we used some super awesome special@power or somethin'!

group_1.textRight: Huh? Uh, yeah, that must be it!

group_1.textLeft: Yep yep!
Anyway, who cares HOW it happened?
Heck, maybe it was me, the Mightiest Magical@Girl, unlocking one of my secret powers!

group_1.textRight: That would make every one of us the@Mightiest.

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah, you're right.

group_1.textRight: I can't deny it's strange, though...how we@got a surge of power so suddenly.

group_1.textLeft: Yes.

group_1.textRight: Hey, guys!

group_1.textLeft: Madoka! Did it happen to you too?

group_1.textRight: Yeah! I have no idea how...
But I feel like I could take on any Witch @now!

group_1.textLeft: We still don't have any idea what caused@this...

group_1.textRight: Who cares?! Let's take advantage of this!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I'm with Kyoko!
Let's go beat that Witch. We can sweat@the details later!
Madoka...

group_1.textRight: Homura! Let's try fighting Walpurgisnacht@one more time!

group_1.textLeft: Okay!
(I wonder why... For some reason...)
(I feel like I can entrust myself to these@feathers dancing down from the sky...)
(My heart was wracked with anxiety and regret@but now it feels light and full of hope!)

group_1.textRight: Well then. Let's take another shot at this!
We'll bring down Walpurgisnacht with all the@might our wishes have imbued us with!

group_1.textLeft: The might of our wishes...
Indeed. It's time we demonstrate what our@unique magic can do.
We'll make use of our wishes, the symbols@of our hope, to erase impurity and curses.
I like that... I think that's the most@fitting way to end this.
Are the other Magical Girls well enough to@fight?

group_1.textRight: Yes. It looks like there's no reason for @concern there.
Everyone is more than ready to eliminate@Walpurgisnacht.
Think you can join us, Mitama?

group_1.textLeft: I think so! I feel like I have wings now.@I can take flight at a moment's notice!

group_1.textRight: Great. Don't go racing up the highway to@heaven on us though, all right?

group_1.textLeft: Don't be silly! *Giggle*
Kaede? Rena? You guys good to go?

group_1.textCenter: Yeah. Not sure why, but I couldn't feel@better!
I can go any time, just give the signal!

group_1.textRight: Yeah!
I'll make up for all the time I couldn't help@because I was out cold!

group_1.textCenter: Let's destroy Walpurgisnacht...so we can take@Nemu back home.
